title: 18: The Ideal Type
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: When we say , "The Ideal Type," it's really just a way of expressing in shorthand that we cling to the idea of an ideal: an ideal way to live, an ideal way for man to live in culture. This is a discussion of that ideal.
itunes:author: A.J., Graeme, & Bees
itunes:subtitle: A discussion of the man we all wish to be
itunes:summary: When we say , "The Ideal Type," it's really just a way of expressing in shorthand that we cling to the idea of an ideal: an ideal way to live, an ideal way for man to live in culture. This is a discussion of that ideal.
